statements: UPDATE job_market_data SET salary_range='3000 - 5000' WHERE job_title='Software Engineer';
UPDATE job_market_data SET skills_required='Python, Java, SQL' WHERE company_name='Tech Solutions';
UPDATE job_market_data SET salary_range='1000-2000' WHERE job_title='Software Engineer' AND company_name='Google';
UPDATE job_market_data SET skills_required='Python, Java, SQL' WHERE job_location='New York' AND company_name='Microsoft';
UPDATE JobMarketData SET job_title='Software Engineer', company_name='Tech Corp' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE SkillAnalysis SET skill_level='Advanced', skill_category='Programming' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE JobMarketData SET job_title = 'Data Analyst', company_name = 'XYZ Corp' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SkillAnalysis SET skill_level = 'Expert', skill_category = 'Data Science', skill_name = 'Python' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE job_postings SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', job_type = 'Full-time', salary_range = '$80,000 - $100,000' WHERE posting_id = 1;
UPDATE skills SET skill_name = 'Python' WHERE skill_id = 1;
UPDATE job_postings SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', salary_range = '$80,000 - $100,000' WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc'
UPDATE skill_requirements SET skill_id = 3 WHERE posting_id = 1
UPDATE job_listings SET job_title='Software Engineer', company_name='Tech Inc', salary=80000.00 WHERE job_id=1;
UPDATE job_skills SET skill_level='Advanced' WHERE job_id=1 AND skill_name='Java Development';
UPDATE job_listings SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', company_name = 'ABC Company' WHERE job_id = 1;
UPDATE job_skills SET skill_level = 'Advanced' WHERE job_id = 1 AND skill_name = 'Java';
UPDATE jobs SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', company_name = 'Tech Co', job_description = 'Seeking a passionate software engineer.', skills_required = 'Java, Python, SQL' WHERE job_id = 1;
UPDATE job_applicants SET applicant_name = 'John Doe', applicant_email = 'john.doe@example.com', applicant_skills = 'Java, Python', applied_job_id = 1 WHERE applicant_id = 1;
UPDATE jobs SET job_title = 'Senior Software Engineer', company_name = 'XYZ Tech', skills_required = 'Java, Python, SQL' WHERE job_id = 101;
UPDATE job_applicants SET applicant_name = 'Alice Johnson', applicant_skills = 'Java, C++, HTML' WHERE applicant_id = 201;
